item.title: Ex-Rep. Elaine Luria announces candidacy for her former House seat in Virginia
item.description: Former Rep. Elaine Luria, who lost reelection in 2022, is launching a comeback bid for her old congressional seat in Virginia.

item.title: 'Trans women are women': Dem Scott Wiener sends message to musician after locker-room attack
item.description: California state Sen. Scott Wiener had a message for women fearful of males in their locker rooms: Trans women are women.
